festival.introText:
Get ready to sing your heart out to the UK’s favourite tunes, hosted by Manchester Music Legend Clint Boon, and Bez is back!

 

What makes FIELDS OF GOLD FESTIVAL the tribute festival you WON`T WANT TO MISS?

 

Fastest bar service!

 

Great choice of alcoholic drinks!

 

Over 18`s only!

 

Fabulous choice of 5 Star food to suit everyone!

 

Cleanest toilets!

 

Big top marquee for shelter if it rains, everyone is a VIP!

 

The BEST reviews from those who attended in 2022!

 

Join up to 5,000 festival-goers who love the same tunes as you.

 

Top DJ's & Fantastic Music from the Top Tribute acts in the UK.

 

Friendly, happy atmosphere.

 

Fairground rides and variety of concessions!

 

Manchester music legend Clint Boon.

And Bez is back!

 

Enough said? We’ll see you down the front, as Clint Boon says.

reviews.body: The event was completely  ruined by the RIP off prices for food  and drink. Extortionate.

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviews.body:
+Amazing weekend, great bands , great venue :)
- alcohol overpriced & not allowed to come back in if you had to leave the venue :(

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviews.body: Itâs a very well run event.  Great band line ups and Clint Boon is great.  Very fair prices too.

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviews.body: our first time. wish we'd booked for Saturday and Sunday now. Bands, music, atmosphere all amazing. Definitely see you next year in the FOG ð

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviews.body: it was very well organised with plenty of good security drinks and food quite expensive and my partner got overcharged at the bar one time as he did not check the price list but had a great day out would come again next year but work commitments make it awkward to do the 3days unless we used holidays so maybe make the friday and sunday as long as the saturdays then it may be worth taking the time off work

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviews.body: Brilliant event, really enjoyed the laid back vibe in the day, Noasis were the highlight for us. Absolutely no trouble from the crowd and great location to travel home. We will be back next year!

reviews.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022

faqs.question: Are pre-payment plan tickets available?
faqs.answer: No Payment Plan tickets are not available through Skiddle

faqs.question: Does Fields Of Gold have onsite camping?
faqs.answer:
No. There will be no camping facilities at Fields Of Gold Festival. 

There are hotels within walking distance of the festival site and several nearby which are either on bus routes or close enough to travel to the site by taxi.

faqs.question: Where is Fields Of Gold?
faqs.answer: Fields Of Gold Festival takes place at Ashton Cricket Club, Rayner Lane, OL7 0FU. (please note, if using apple maps please search for the full address including street name and postcode)

faqs.question: Does Fields Of Gold have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes! Fields Of Gold Festival is an 18+ event.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

 

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: How do I get to Fields Of Gold ?
faqs.answer:
By Metro - Metrolink is our recommended route to Fields Of Gold Festival. Our festival site is just 10 metres from Ashton West Tram Stop. Trams are very frequent at this stop (every 6 Minutes ) and it takes just 9 minutes to travel to and from Manchester City Centre. With trams running well into the night there is no rush to leave us early!

By Car - Ashton Cricket Club is conveniently located just 1 mile from junction 23 of the M60 Motorway. Car Parking will be available on the day. If you would like to park at Fields Of Gold set your sat nav to Ashton Cricket Club, Rayner Lane, Ashton Under Lyne, OL7 OFU and following the signs for “CAR PARK” . (Please note if searching for us on apple maps please make sure you type in our full address or it may not find our exact location).

By Bus - Ashton Cricket Club is on a major bus route in and out of Manchester City Centre.

 

By Rail - Ashton Train Station is only 1 mile away from our festival site. To plan a journey to and from Ashton Train Station

faqs.question: Can I bring my own food and drink into Fields Of Gold?
faqs.answer: No, typical items you cannot bring onto site are food, drink, and glass objects (except for vapes and perfume/aftershave, in bottles not greater than 100ml).

reviewsDisplayFour.body: Fantastic event. Clint Boon is a legend!

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Fields Of Gold Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body:
I felt about 90% of the people at the venue (Friday night) were off a similar age to me, I'm 55. there was no trouble, the atmosphere was great, the venue was right next to the tram stop. I've seen images of Creamfields, reading and other outdoor venues that have been trashed, rubbish strewn all over, there was none of this at fields of gold, respectful Generation X.
I'll definitely be going again next year.
